headline: Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of power management chips maker Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) jumped 2.6% in the afternoon session after it received positive attention from analysts, including an upgrade from Wolfe Research and a significant price target increase from Oppenheimer.

headline: Broadcom and 2 More Chip Stocks to Play the AI Boom That Aren’t Nvidia
summary: Broadcom and two other semiconductor companies look like good bets ahead of earnings, according to Oppenheimer analysts.
